item.title: Lex podcast jot: meaning of life and human being 2-dimensional
item.description: These are some notes on Lex’s podcast. I find it’s quite difficult to talk about the subject of the meaning of life because no one truly understand the mystery of life and this is a rare situation where the difference in knowledge between audience and talker is narrow. At a result, to those philosophical and vague hypothesis/questions without substantial answers, often the listener’s reaction is like “but ’ve also thought about before (I’m here for an answer)”.
